names.pinyin: huang qin qing fei yin jia wei
names.english: modified scutellaria clear the lungs drink
names.commonEnglish: Modified Scutellaria Clear the Lungs Drink

actions: Clears Heat, cools the Blood, nourishes Yin and generates fluids.
Clears and drains Lung Heat, transforms Phlegm, moistens Lung Dryness, relieves toxicity, expels pus and reduces swelling.
With Zhi Zi, powerfully clears and drains lurking Heat from the Lungs with fever, fullness in the chest, cough with yellow sputum and epistaxis or hematemesis.
Clears Heat, reduces Fire, eliminates irritability, reduces swelling and activates the Blood.
Drains Heat from the Lungs, stops cough, calms wheezing, promotes urination and reduces edema.
With Huang Qin, drains Heat from the Lungs, and stops cough and wheezing.
Promotes urination and leaches out Dampness
Stops cough, calms wheezing, moistens the Intestines and unblocks bowels.
Opens the Lungs, spreads Lung Qi, expels Phlegm and benefits the throat.
With Gan Cao and Huang Qin, disseminates Lung Qi, expels Phlegm, resolves toxicity and expels pus for productive cough with hoarseness, pain and swelling of the throat.
Moistens the Lungs, resolves Phlegm, stops cough, clears Heat, relieves Fire toxicity, moderates and harmonizes the harsh properties of other herbs and guides the herbs to all twelve channels.
With Jie Geng, for pain and swelling of the throat.

symptoms: Drips and drops, but lack of free flow
A dry throat with a desire to drink
